721010f-a.text:
Lexington Ave., east side, south from and including East 47th Street. Prominently shown, is the Chrysler Building.
February 14, 1932.
P.L. Sperr.

713288f-a.text:
47th Street, north side, from Lexington to Third Avenues.
March 18,1926.
P.L. Sperr.

721011f-a.text:
Lexington Avenue, east side, north from S.W. corner of 47th Street.
October 29, 1927.

P.L. Sperr, Photographer.
